name: Amunets Server Transfer - v1.1.2
description:
[b]Mod-ID[/b]: 2305969565

A server cluster solution for conan.
This mod allows switching "on the fly" between servers (in multiplayer) and maps (in singleplayer) while taking your character with you.

Supports many popular mods, including (but not limited to):
- Thrall Wars Dungeon Mod
- Endgame Extended Weapon Arsenal (EEWA)
- Kerozards Paragon Leveling - Reloaded
- Restricted Exiles

Discord @ https://discord.gg/a8hGAKW
Patreon @ https://www.patreon.com/sailorsat

For MS-Store users - read [url=https://forums.funcom.com/t/for-ms-store-how-to-get-mods-off-the-steam-workshop-without-a-steam-account/174325]this[/url].
changeNote:
2022-09-28 - Amunets Server Transfer v1.1.2
- fix the transfer chat turning itself off on server restart. (oops)
- changed the transfer chat color to something more like the vanilla global color. - (not configurable yet)
- chat will ignore anything starting with a / now.
author: LilMissHentai
